properties.entry: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID , M.USERNAME , M.PASSWORD , M.ENABLED , M.ACCOUNTNONEXPIRED , M.CREDENTIALSNONEXPIRED , M.ACCOUNTNONLOCKED , IFNULL(MA.ATTEMPTS, 0) AS ATTEMPTS , IFNULL(MA.LASTMODIFIED, SYSDATE()) AS LASTMODIFIED FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN MEMBERATTEMPTS MA ON M.MEMBER_ID = MA.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.USERNAME = ?
SELECT M.USERNAME , UR.ROLE FROM USER_ROLES UR INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = UR.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.USERNAME = ?
